service_name.title: Service name
service_name.description: Name of the K2 service  http://myk2server.com/{SERVICE_NAME}

use_ssh.title: Use ssh
use_ssh.description: If checked, an SSH tunnel will be used to call the API

username.title: Username
username.description: The SSH User for connecting to your SSH server

#private_key.title: Private key
#private_key.description: The base64-encoded private key for the key pair associated with your SSH server

tunnel_host.title: Tunnel host
tunnel_host.description: The host name or host IP associated with your SSH server (Note: Don't use load balancer as host)

remote_address.title: K2 API source address
remote_address.description: The address that is used to query the K2 API e.g. k2api.myfirm.cz

remote_port.title: K2 API port
remote_port.description: The port of the K2 API e.g. 8080

source_url.title: Source url
source_url.description: The address that is used to query the K2 API, e.g. https://myk2server.com
